previous.excerpt:
COCA-COLA (KO) - Historically has traded higher from around Feb. 25 to about
Jul. 12. These dates are suggestions only to when to be in and out of the stock.
I start looking for buying signals in the month of Feb. and sell signals by Jul.
KO has a 86% win rate, hold time 95 days, Avg Profit 12%,…

next.title:
SPACs have been very lucrative for the sponsor.

"The average SPAC sponsor return less concessions, forfeiture and vesting over the last two years was 648%."

From Michael Cembalest at JPM https://t.co/OxCgvYJeKX

localize.full_text:
SPACs对赞助商来说是非常有利可图的。

"过去两年，SPAC保荐人的平均回报率减去让步、没收和归属，为648%。"

来自JPM的Michael Cembalest https://t.co/OxCgvYJeKX

SPACs對贊助商來說是非常有利可圖的。

"過去兩年，SPAC保薦人的平均回報率減去讓步、沒收和歸屬，爲648%。"

來自JPM的Michael Cembalest https://t.co/OxCgvYJeKX
